Class VariableActionNode

java.lang.Object
parser.nodes.variables.VariableActionNode

public class VariableActionNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Exec
Perform a given action on a variable

    • VariableActionNode

      public VariableActionNode​(java.lang.String varName, Number number, Handler handler)
      Create the object.
      Parameters:
      varName - The name of the variable.
      number - A number which may be used to update the variable contents.
      handler - The maze handler.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public java.lang.Object execute​(boolean DEBUG)
      Get the variable out of the map. If applicable use the action variable to update the variable object. Otherwise use the number variable.

      Parameters:
